RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1 1/16M Turf CR: 88. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since September 3, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile anda Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIVE IT UP quick speed from the gate, well handled with all pace, held sway. SEAWARD striking position throughout while no match for winner 2nd best. UNWHIRLED squeezed back while in tight from the gate, rallied on for show while evenly from the rail. DICHOTOMY chased winner to the half with nothing left in the stretch run. TAPERINEA tried to keep up to the half to no avail and faded back readily. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Seaward
ENTRY.COMMENT: striking position throughout while no match for winner 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Live It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed from the gate, well handled with all pace, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Unwhirled
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed back start, rallied on for show while evenly rail

ENTRY.NAME: Taperinea
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to the half to no avail and faded back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Dichotomy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner to the half with nothing left in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since September 3, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GIVE GOD PRAISE speed to the front, led to the half, lost position into the far turn, retallied and came up rail in the final stages to clear off good handling to the wire. BAKER'S MAN trailed to far turn, rallied on for place spot no match late. HENDRIX lunged at the start from the gate, between horses to far turn, led past quarter pole, weakened late. JOHNNY'S MOMENT off rail chase to quarter pole, gave way readily in stretch run.

ENTRY.NAME: Baker's Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed to far turn, rallied on for place spot no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Hendrix
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged at the start, led past quarter pole, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Give God Praise
ENTRY.OWNER: New Adventure Stables and Bush, George S.
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, led to the half, lost position came on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Johnny's Moment
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail chase to quarter pole, gave way readily in stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 13100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON FOUR RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since September 3, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race S ince Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility And Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVER BOY perfect position and handling to far turn, bid past the quarter pole to go clear under stout handling to the wire. SUPREME SONG saved ground to far turn in good position, circled the field past quarter pole and ran on while no match but best of the rest to the wire. NOT YET CHARLIE off rail pressure to far turn, forged a narrow led into stretch stayed on for for show spot. SONO GRATO unprepared start with a slow beginning and never menaced throughout. FIRERY TALE never threatened throughout. NO HANG CHARLIE speed to the front for a half but gave way readily from inside and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Firery Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Supreme Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to far turn, circled field into stretch, no match

ENTRY.NAME: No Hang Charlie
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front for a half, gave way from quarter pole inisde

ENTRY.NAME: Not Yet Charlie
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail pressure to far turn, narrow led into stretch for show

ENTRY.NAME: Sono Grato
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox John E Basler Tom Pohl Dennis and Pohl Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow beginning and never untracked while no menace

ENTRY.NAME: River Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position and handling to far turn, bid quarter pole clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON FOUR RACES IN 2022. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility And Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY ROSIE dueled from two path, rallied into the stretch while off rail and cleared under strong handling to the wire. SUMMER STORM speed to duel winner, stayed game in the stretch held place. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY no speed to the turn, rallied gamely along for show spot. C V THUNDER raced along evenly throughout and just missed show spot on wire. SHEZA HOOT never menaced throughout. ANCIENT BROWN missed the break with a slow start and never factored throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Ancient Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: missed the break with a slow start and never factored throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Hoot
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Lerios Virginia
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: C V Thunder
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout and just missed show spot on wire

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, rallied gamely along for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Summer Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to duel winner, stayed game in the stretch held place

ENTRY.NAME: My Rosie
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara J and Ouzts Toni
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from two path, rallied into the stretch off rail cleared

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 80. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to the Main Track, thi s race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRAMA CRITIC three wide pressing pace to far turn, took over in the stretch and drove clear under stout handling throughout. RED CHEEKS hustled to the front, well handled to far turn, no match held place spot. UNUSUAL ACTIVITY saved ground while evenly throughout for the show spot. LIAMS LAD lost best chance when rearing and lunging at the start and only improved position. SOUTHERN BREEZE rushed into first turn outside to go evenly with no late kick. MUD PUDDLE dueled to far turn with nothing left and dropped back. RAGING WHIRLWIND never menaced throughout. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Red Cheeks
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled to the front, well handled to far turn, no match held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mud Puddle
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to far turn with nothing left and dropped back

ENTRY.NAME: Unusual Activity
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground while evenly throughout for the show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Whirlwind
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Liams Lad
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost best chance when rearing at the start, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Drama Critic
ENTRY.COMMENT: three wide pressing pace to far turn, took over drove clear

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed into first turn outside to go evenly with no late kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLO BOLO shoed speed to front, led to half, chased in the stretch between foes and fought on gamely for the nod at the wire under stout handling. IMAGE OF LOVE chased pace to the stretch, dug in gamely outside to widen in the lane and just missed.at the wire in a three way photo. UNREGRETTED was extremely rowdy prerace from the paddock with a sluggish start, rushed and led in the stretch, cleared in the final furlong but nailed at the wire with a good effort. CAUSE IMA ROSE broke slow, raced back to the stretch and only closed the gap late from inside. SKI SLOPE could not keep up and faded back readily from the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Cause Ima Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow, raced back to the stretch, closed the gap late inside

ENTRY.NAME: Image of Love
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace to the stretch, dug in gamely outside just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Ski Slope
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up and faded back readily from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Rolo Bolo
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to front, led to half, chased stretch between foes gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Unregretted
ENTRY.COMMENT: very rowdy pre race, sluggish start, led stretch, cleared nailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 3 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 3 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PARKER had good position just off leaders to the turn, rallied into stretch with a rally and cleared off under good handling to the wire. WHEREWEGOIN never far back to the stretch from off rail, rallied on in the stretch for the place spot. LOCK ON no speed to the stretch, rallied on in the lane for show spot. NYOMAN battled along outside to the turn, stayed on in stretch faltered. CUT GLASS broke well to the front, stayed to the stretch, gave in readily. VENICE BEACH brief duel from inside to turn, gave way readily readily. I'M EVER READY in tight from the gate, steadied back to the turn, no threat. HARD LIGHTING broke tardy from the gate, saved ground throughout to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Lighting
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy from the gate, saved ground throughout to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Venice Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief duel from inside to turn, gave way readily readily

ENTRY.NAME: Cut Glass
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well to the front, stayed to the stretch, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Parker
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position just off leaders, rallied into stretch, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Ever Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight from the gate, steadied back to the turn, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Wherewegoin
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back to the stretch off rail, rallied on for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Nyoman
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled along outside to the turn, stayed on in stretch faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Lock On
ENTRY.OWNER: Haehn T R and Molumby John
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the stretch, rallied on in the lane for show spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 5F Turf CR: 81. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winner s Of A Race Since September 3, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $16,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORNIN' BOSS quick from the gate, outsprinted to the front, chased leader to deep stretch, roused to go clear late under good handling to the wire. CRYSTAL SNOW had an awkward start from the gate with a lunge, rallied outside to the turn and came running on for place with a good effort. MOTOWN MISCHIEF good position to the turn, rallied along to close gap for show. WHISKEY DIAMOND sprinted clear from the gate crossed over quickly to the rail, stayed to deep stretch but gave in readily in the final furlong for show spot. JUSTA SIMPLE GIRL no speed to the turn, rallied in the drive to improve late. MS. THE LAW raced back early with a slight bobble to the turn. BLEST LIFE raced back with trouble into turn, shuffled back with no kick. MISS EASY slow from the gate and never menaced throughout. MY HEAD HURTS through early and dropped back readily. BALI DOVE (FR) close up early on inside, troubled into the turn, checked back hard and lost all chance while outrun thereafter. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Easy
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC Tribbett Robert L and Bechtel Glenn
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow from the gate and never menaced throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Motown Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the turn, rallied along to close gap for show

ENTRY.NAME: Bali Dove (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early on inside, in tight and checked back hard outrun

ENTRY.NAME: My Head Hurts
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early and dropped back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. the Law
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back early with a slight bobble to the turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Justa Simple Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Al Bianchi Racing LLC Oringer Jay and BayTree Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn, rallied in the drive to improve late

ENTRY.NAME: Blest Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back with trouble into turn, shuffled back with no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Mornin' Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to deep stretch, roused to go clear late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal Snow
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, rallied outside to turn, came running for place

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Diamond
ENTRY.OWNER: Borchetta Mike Borchetta Martha and Borchetta Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear from the gate to deep stretch, gave in readily
